Metro UI

your way to build a web application

MetroUI includes everything you need to build your frontend app: responsive grid system, 100+ prebuilt components, 500+ incons, and powerful JavaScript plugins.

7K+ stars on GitHub
Try Metro UI Read Docs Purchase Support


100+ COMPONENTS
More than 100 reusable components for all kinds of frontend tasks: navigation, alerts, dropdowns, inputs and much more.
DEPENDENCY FREE
MetroUI library has no dependencies on any third-party libraries. Everything you might need is included in the toolkit.
PAID OPTION
TECHNICAL SUPPORT
We will be there for you when you need help. Rapid response and quick fixing of detected problems.
FREE LICENSE
MetroUI is absolutely free both for personal and commercial usage (distributed by MIT license).


SCREENSHOTS



PANDORA DEMO

Pandora - is a Responsive and Clean Admin Dashboard template. This template created with Metro UI with uses native classes, elements, and components. The template contains different types of reusable and professional responsive components with different variations.
